About

I’m a platform-focused engineer shaping secure, scalable, and observable infrastructure. I enjoy mentoring teams, codifying best practices, and partnering with developers to ship reliable experiences.

My toolkit spans Azure cloud, infrastructure as code, automation, and service reliability. I translate strategic business needs into resilient platforms that help teams deliver with confidence.

Projects

Open-source work and collaborations, curated for reliability and developer experience.

Featured

BP

Birth Plan

Birth plan website for pregnant women to generate a plan — collaboration project.

Birth Plan helps expectant parents create a calm, shareable birth plan with guided prompts and printable output. It brings together healthcare guidance, clear design, and empathetic language so families can feel prepared for labour conversations.

Next.jsAzure Static Web AppsPlaywrightTailwind CSS
Visit site View repo
R

RepoMerge

Git repository aggregator for GitHub and GitLab with unified sharing and code search.

RepoMerge indexes repositories from GitHub and GitLab into one searchable surface, making it effortless to share curated collections across teams. It handles authentication, sync scheduling, and fast query responses for engineering enablement.

Azure FunctionsCosmos DBGitHub AppsTypeScript
Visit site View repo
ALT

Azure Labs Toolkit

Infrastructure blueprints and scripts for Azure learning environments.

A turnkey toolkit for spinning up Azure lab environments with consistent security guardrails. Includes reusable Terraform modules, Bicep templates, and GitHub Actions pipelines for provisioning and teardown on-demand.

AzureTerraformBicepGitHub Actions
Demo Repo
KDT

Kubernetes Deployment Templates

Opinionated Kubernetes deployment templates for rapid app delivery.

Curated Helm charts and GitOps-ready manifests for platform teams. The templates bake in sensible defaults for ingress, monitoring, and secrets management so teams can ship secure workloads faster.

KubernetesHelmGitOps
Repo
POK

Platform Observability Kit

Dashboards and alerts that surface platform health signals.

A ready-to-run observability stack that standardises dashboards, alert rules, and runbook links across platforms. Helps teams make confident, data-informed operational decisions.
